table.name: a
table.select-text:
-- select a.npp as npp, /*Порядковый номер*//*number*/ a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*Титул*//*number*/ kod_titul_ip.name as name, /*Наименование инвестиционного проекта*//*string*/ kod_titul_ip_x_n.tit_num_new as kod_titul_ip_x_n, /*Титул*//*string*/ a.is_new as is_new, /*number*/ a.is_not_new as is_not_new, /*number*/ a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order/*number*//*key*/
from ( --ipr_ofz_tit_order select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order, /*number*//*key*/ a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /**//*number*/ a.npp as npp, /**//*number*/ 0 as is_new, /*number*/ 1 as is_not_new/*number*/
from ipr_ofz_tit_order a --\ipr_ofz_tit_order ) a --\ipr_ofz_tit_order left outer join ( --ipr_titul_ip select a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*number*//*key*/ a.tit_num_new as tit_num_new/*Код титула*//*string*/
from ipr_titul_ip a --\ipr_titul_ip ) kod_titul_ip_x_n on a.kod_titul_ip = kod_titul_ip_x_n.kod_titul_ip--\ipr_titul_ip left outer join ( --ipr_titul_ip select a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*number*//*key*/ a.name as name/*Наименование инвестиционного проекта*//*string*/
from ipr_titul_ip a --\ipr_titul_ip ) kod_titul_ip on a.kod_titul_ip = kod_titul_ip.kod_titul_ip--\ipr_titul_ip --\

root.query:
--a select a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /**//*number*//*key*/ a.tit_num_new as tit_num_new, /*Код титула*//*string*/ a.name as name/*Наименование инвестиционного проекта*//*string*/
from ( --ipr_titul_ip select a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*number*//*key*/ a.tit_num_new as tit_num_new, /*Код титула*//*string*/ a.name as name/*Наименование инвестиционного проекта*//*string*/
from ipr_titul_ip a --\ipr_titul_ip ) a --\ipr_titul_ip
where ( rownum <= :p_rows_limit ) { and (a.kod_titul_ip in :pk_prm ) } { and ( lower( a.kod_titul_ip ) like lower( :kod_titul_ip_filter ) ) } { and ( lower( a.tit_num_new ) like lower( :tit_num_new_filter ) ) } { and ( lower( a.name ) like lower( :name_filter ) ) } --\a

select.query:
-- select kod_titul_ip.name as name, /*Наименование инвестиционного проекта*//*string*/ kod_titul_ip_x_n.tit_num_new as kod_titul_ip_x_n, /*Титул*//*string*/ a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order/*number*//*key*/
from ( --ipr_ofz_tit_order select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order, /*number*//*key*/ a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip/**//*number*/
from (select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order,a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip from ipr_ofz_tit_order a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_ofz_tit_order=t.f2 ) and a.kod_ofz_tit_order in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm union all select t.n3 as kod_ofz_tit_order,t.n2 as kod_titul_ip from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm ) a --\(select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order,a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip from ipr_ofz_tit_order a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_ofz_tit_order=t.f2 ) and a.kod_ofz_tit_order in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm union all select t.n3 as kod_ofz_tit_order,t.n2 as kod_titul_ip from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm ) ) a --\ipr_ofz_tit_order left outer join ( --ipr_titul_ip select a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*number*//*key*/ a.tit_num_new as tit_num_new/*Код титула*//*string*/
from ipr_titul_ip a --\ipr_titul_ip ) kod_titul_ip_x_n on a.kod_titul_ip = kod_titul_ip_x_n.kod_titul_ip--\ipr_titul_ip left outer join ( --ipr_titul_ip select a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*number*//*key*/ a.name as name/*Наименование инвестиционного проекта*//*string*/
from ipr_titul_ip a --\ipr_titul_ip ) kod_titul_ip on a.kod_titul_ip = kod_titul_ip.kod_titul_ip--\ipr_titul_ip --\

-- select kod_titul_ip.name as name, /*Наименование инвестиционного проекта*//*string*/ a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order/*number*//*key*/
from ( --ipr_ofz_tit_order select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order, /*number*//*key*/ a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip/**//*number*/
from (select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order,a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip from ipr_ofz_tit_order a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_ofz_tit_order=t.f2 ) and a.kod_ofz_tit_order in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm union all select t.n3 as kod_ofz_tit_order,t.n2 as kod_titul_ip from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm ) a --\(select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order,a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip from ipr_ofz_tit_order a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_ofz_tit_order=t.f2 ) and a.kod_ofz_tit_order in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm union all select t.n3 as kod_ofz_tit_order,t.n2 as kod_titul_ip from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm ) ) a --\ipr_ofz_tit_order left outer join ( --ipr_titul_ip select a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*number*//*key*/ a.name as name/*Наименование инвестиционного проекта*//*string*/
from ipr_titul_ip a --\ipr_titul_ip ) kod_titul_ip on a.kod_titul_ip = kod_titul_ip.kod_titul_ip--\ipr_titul_ip --\

-- select kod_titul_ip_x_n.tit_num_new as kod_titul_ip_x_n, /*Титул*//*string*/ a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order/*number*//*key*/
from ( --ipr_ofz_tit_order select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order, /*number*//*key*/ a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip/**//*number*/
from (select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order,a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip from ipr_ofz_tit_order a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_ofz_tit_order=t.f2 ) and a.kod_ofz_tit_order in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm union all select t.n3 as kod_ofz_tit_order,t.n2 as kod_titul_ip from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm ) a --\(select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order,a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip from ipr_ofz_tit_order a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_ofz_tit_order=t.f2 ) and a.kod_ofz_tit_order in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm union all select t.n3 as kod_ofz_tit_order,t.n2 as kod_titul_ip from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm ) ) a --\ipr_ofz_tit_order left outer join ( --ipr_titul_ip select a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*number*//*key*/ a.tit_num_new as tit_num_new/*Код титула*//*string*/
from ipr_titul_ip a --\ipr_titul_ip ) kod_titul_ip_x_n on a.kod_titul_ip = kod_titul_ip_x_n.kod_titul_ip--\ipr_titul_ip --\

table.clear-temp-text: delete from rr_temp where skod='a' and names=:form_id

select.query:
-- select a.npp as npp, /*Порядковый номер*//*number*/ a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*Титул*//*number*/ kod_titul_ip.name as name, /*Наименование инвестиционного проекта*//*string*/ kod_titul_ip_x_n.tit_num_new as kod_titul_ip_x_n, /*Титул*//*string*/ a.is_new as is_new, /*number*/ a.is_not_new as is_not_new, /*number*/ a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order/*number*//*key*/
from ( --ipr_ofz_tit_order select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order, /*number*//*key*/ a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /**//*number*/ a.npp as npp, /**//*number*/ a.is_new as is_new, /*number*/ a.is_not_new as is_not_new/*number*/
from (select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order,a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip,a.npp as npp,0 as is_new,1 as is_not_new from ipr_ofz_tit_order a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_ofz_tit_order=t.f2 ) and a.kod_ofz_tit_order in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm union all select t.n3 as kod_ofz_tit_order,t.n2 as kod_titul_ip,t.n1 as npp,decode (f3,1,1,0) as is_new,decode (f3,1,0,1) as is_not_new from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm ) a --\(select a.kod_ofz_tit_order as kod_ofz_tit_order,a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip,a.npp as npp,0 as is_new,1 as is_not_new from ipr_ofz_tit_order a where not exists (select * from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and a.kod_ofz_tit_order=t.f2 ) and a.kod_ofz_tit_order in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm union all select t.n3 as kod_ofz_tit_order,t.n2 as kod_titul_ip,t.n1 as npp,decode (f3,1,1,0) as is_new,decode (f3,1,0,1) as is_not_new from rr_temp t where t.skod ='a' and t.names=:form_id and t.f3!=3 and t.f2 in :kod_ofz_tit_order_prm ) ) a --\ipr_ofz_tit_order left outer join ( --ipr_titul_ip select a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*number*//*key*/ a.tit_num_new as tit_num_new/*Код титула*//*string*/
from ipr_titul_ip a --\ipr_titul_ip ) kod_titul_ip_x_n on a.kod_titul_ip = kod_titul_ip_x_n.kod_titul_ip--\ipr_titul_ip left outer join ( --ipr_titul_ip select a.kod_titul_ip as kod_titul_ip, /*number*//*key*/ a.name as name/*Наименование инвестиционного проекта*//*string*/
from ipr_titul_ip a --\ipr_titul_ip ) kod_titul_ip on a.kod_titul_ip = kod_titul_ip.kod_titul_ip--\ipr_titul_ip --\
